attributes.action: Concentrate on The social and economic problems of our own country first
attributes.additional_details: I as a citizen of the UK feels betrayed by our recent governments. That is in the respect of when they know there are social and economic problems here they still cut public services here whilst still finding the money to send to other Countries in 'aid' and 'bailouts' They should be spending the money here first then see what is left for others second. Concentrate on this Countries needy first!
